summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreePromote the appearance of naturally fuller, bolder looking brows in just 6-8 weeks with the GrandeBROW Brow Enhancing Serum by Grande Cosmetics.
details: DetailsBenefitsInfused with a blend of vitamins, antioxidants, and amino acids to promote the appearance of fuller, bolder looking brows in 6-8 weeks, with full improvement in 4 monthsPerfect for sparse, thinning, over-plucked, or tail-less browsConditions brow hairs for a healthier looking appearanceDermatologist testedKey IngredientsAmino Acids (L-Proline): An amino acid essential to healthy, fortified browsHyaluronic Acid (Sodium Hyaluronate): Conditions, protects & hydrates browsVitamin E (Tocopheryl Acetate): An essential vitamin to support brow healthBotanical Extract Blend: An antioxidant-rich compound derived from natural sources (ginseng root, chamomile flowers & bearberry leaves) that helps strengthens the brow follicleGlycosaminoglycans: Locks in moisture for conditioned, healthier-looking browsItem 2544505How To UseAs with all cosmetic products used in the area of the eye (or close proximity to the eye), it is important to carefully read all directions and warnings. Carefully apply GrandeBROW once daily on a clean, dry brow to the natural shape of your brow, concentrating on sparse, thinning or over-plucked areas. Apply only with the product applicator provided. Allow 2-3 minutes for the serum to fully dry before applying other products to your brow or eye area. If serum gets into the eye, immediately rinse thoroughly with cool water to completely remove serum from the eye. Apply every day for a full 4 months. After desired improvement is achieved, apply every other day for maintenance. GrandeBROW requires continued use to maintain benefits.This cosmetic product contains (a small amount of) isopropyl cloprostenate, an analog of prostaglandin. It is important to use the product as instructed so that it does not get into the eye. As instructed in the directions for application, if product does come into contact with the eye, immediately rinse thoroughly with cool water to completely remove the cosmetic serum from the eye. If redness, irritation or other unwanted effects occur, stop using product immediately. If symptoms persist, seek medical attention.For external use. Avoid getting in eyes; if so, immediately rinse thoroughly with cool water. Not for use by customers under the age of 18. Do not use on damaged or irritated skin, if pregnant or nursing, undergoing treatment for glaucoma or cancer or if you are being treated for a facial skin condition. If redness, irritation or other unwanted effects occur, stop using product immediately. If symptoms persist, seek medical attention. Keep out of reach of children.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Panthenol, Glycerin, Sodium Citrate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Alanine, Alcohol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Arctostaphylos Uva Ursi Leaf Extract, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, Calcium Gluconate, Caprylyl Glycol, Chamomilla Recutita (Metricaria) Flower Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Gluconolactone, Glycine, Hexylene Glycol, Histidine, Honey Extract/Mel/Extrait de Miel, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Hydrolyzed Yeast Extract, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Isoleucine, Isopropyl Cloprostenate (an analog of prostaglandin), Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, PCA, Phenylalanine, Polysorbate 20, Proline, Propylene Glycol, Serine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Lactate, Sodium PCA, Threonine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Triethanolamine, Tussilago Farfara (Coltsfoot) Leaf Extract, Valine, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Metabisulfite.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: As with all cosmetic products used in the area of the eye (or close proximity to the eye), it is important to carefully read all directions and warnings. Carefully apply GrandeBROW once daily on a clean, dry brow to the natural shape of your brow, concentrating on sparse, thinning or over-plucked areas. Apply only with the product applicator provided. Allow 2-3 minutes for the serum to fully dry before applying other products to your brow or eye area. If serum gets into the eye, immediately rinse thoroughly with cool water to completely remove serum from the eye. Apply every day for a full 4 months. After desired improvement is achieved, apply every other day for maintenance. GrandeBROW requires continued use to maintain benefits.This cosmetic product contains (a small amount of) isopropyl cloprostenate, an analog of prostaglandin. It is important to use the product as instructed so that it does not get into the eye. As instructed in the directions for application, if product does come into contact with the eye, immediately rinse thoroughly with cool water to completely remove the cosmetic serum from the eye. If redness, irritation or other unwanted effects occur, stop using product immediately. If symptoms persist, seek medical attention.For external use. Avoid getting in eyes; if so, immediately rinse thoroughly with cool water. Not for use by customers under the age of 18. Do not use on damaged or irritated skin, if pregnant or nursing, undergoing treatment for glaucoma or cancer or if you are being treated for a facial skin condition. If redness, irritation or other unwanted effects occur, stop using product immediately. If symptoms persist, seek medical attention. Keep out of reach of children.

reviews.headline: Fixed my insecurity!!
reviews.comments: I am super happy with this serum. I used to be insecure about having no eyebrows. It's been a couple months and I can now go out without feeling the need to draw on eyebrows

reviews.headline: It works!
reviews.comments: Originally received a sample of this through Ipsy. After two weeks, my brows were noticeably darker and thicker. Honestly shocked at the results. I am 55 and was able to stop using a brow pencil to fill in. Purchases the full size and have been using with continued great results. Worth every penny.

reviews.headline: Miracle in a tube!
reviews.comments: I have been dealing with thin sparse eyebrows for YEARS since over plucking well over 15 years ago. I was hesitant to try this product but I am absolutely blown away by the results. I apply once at night time and have been using since May. The results are proof that this truly works. I am so happy I decided to try this out!

reviews.headline: It Works!
reviews.comments: This brow serum actually works. I had very sparse tails on my brows, particularly the right one. It's been about 3 weeks and I can see them filling in.

reviews.headline: I buy this item before it runs out…I think it makes a differ
reviews.comments: I've been using this item for over a year now and I really like it and it works..

reviews.headline: A winner!
reviews.comments: I have been using this eye brow treatment for about 5-6 months now. It does work. I don't have to draw eyebrows on any longer. I do use a color brush to make them show up more, but that's because my eyebrows are naturally light. This product worked within the time advertised and I have just purchased my 2nd 4 month supply. It says it can be used every other day after initial treatment but im afraid I'll forget so I just use it everyday. For reference, I am a healthy 67 year old woman.

reviews.headline: Actually works !!!
reviews.comments: I started applying it every nighy starting on march 15 and ending may 10. Honestly i dont think they fill up the tube all the way because no way was that gonna last me 4 months. It was effective but for only lastinh about 2 months its so expensive.
reviews.nickname: Works but not worth the money

reviews.headline: I have noticed results!
reviews.comments: This is my second purchase of this product as it really works! I have definitely noticed a big difference and am very pleased. Can't wait to see more improvements!

reviews.headline: It really works!
reviews.comments: Bought this during the Beauty Steal event just to see if it help with my barely-there brows. It did! I have brows again! If not on sale it is pricey but it works so I ended up buying it again.

reviews.headline: Grow and maintain brows.
reviews.comments: I need this product. It works but I wish more product would be in the tube.

reviews.headline: The best
reviews.comments: The best product.

reviews.headline: Brows
reviews.comments:
I was skeptical but got it as a sample
My 90s brows that havent grown in over 20 years are almost full again. Its been 2 months of almost daily use. I cant wait to see what theu look like at 4 months

reviews.headline: Works but would benefit from a new applictor
reviews.comments: The product does work however, as others have said, it takes time. If the applicator was changed I think it would be well worth the price - especially when on sale. I used a small brush from another eyebrow product from a different brand and I felt I was able to apply the product more evenly.

reviews.headline: Came empty/dry
reviews.comments: I need help, mine came empty. ): brush totally dry, checked inside with light and everything.

reviews.headline: Amazing and effective, wish I tried it sooner!
reviews.comments: I have hypothyroidism/Hashinoto's and I have struggled with sparse brows in the front and ends of my brows ever since I was a kid. In the process of going through two travel size versions, I have seen my brows grow and become fuller than they have ever been. This product truly works! I just repurchased the full size version. I will be repurchasing as long as they sell it (please never discontinue or change the formula)!!

reviews.headline: So Thankful for this product
reviews.comments:
i love this product. My eyebrows were completely shedding and i spent half the morning drawing them in.. After about 4 months they are back to normal volume and i no longer have to draw them on. 
The only reason why i didnt give full stars is the package because of the case i never know when im almost out to order more. its super cute but not knowing how much is left is super frustrating

reviews.headline: Works, but feels like there's hardly any product in there
reviews.comments: I have noticed a difference in the growth of my brows. Im on my second travel size bottle. I think it definitely works but it seems like there's hardly any product in the tube.

reviews.headline: I have been using this product for well over a year now...
reviews.comments: This product does help with growing the eyebrow hair but only the first part of my brows.

reviews.headline: Definitely Works!
reviews.comments: When something works, you keep purchasing it!   This works!   My Esthetician even commented on the hairs that are coming in on my brows!

reviews.headline: MADE MY EYEBROWS FALL OUT
reviews.comments: Please dont buy this profuct if you still want to have a nice full pair of eyebrows

media.headline: HANDS DOWN INSANE RESULTS!!! I FINALLY HAVE EYEBROWS!
media.caption: The top photo is my eyebrows 4 months ago before using the product. The bottom one is my eyebrows now after 4 months of nightly use- the results are absolutely insane!! Saw so much new growth on existing hairs & many new hairs came in as well. My eyebrows look much more full and thick now and I'm super happy about the results. I was hesitant at first bc of the price- but now I can definitely saw that it was for sure worth the splurge!! Don't waste your money on other, cheaper products- buy this, you will not regret it!!

media.headline: Absolute best thing to happen to my eyebrows

faceoff_positive.comments: This product was highly recommended to me by a family member.  I am a mature woman and was desperate because I found myself spending much too much time trying to recreate eyebrows that no longer existed - and trying to make them look natural was another challenge.  I started seeing an improvement within weeks of use, and I am now approaching the maximum improvement time of four months since I started this application back in July.  I certainly plan to continue with the maintenance schedule of the every-other-day application thereafter, as recommended.  My eyebrows grew in darker than I expected, but I can definitely live with that.  One point that I would like to make is to be careful where you buy this product.  My first purchase was made in an actual physical Ulta Beauty store.  After that I purchased online from an outside source because the price was enticing.  The product I purchased online did not last long at all (a couple of weeks, at most).  This is the point I'm trying to make:  the last purchase that I just made was from Ulta Beauty online, and, much to my surprise, I noticed that the product came covered in a plastic security wrap.  This wrap did not appear on the other online purchase that I made from the other (unnamed) source.  No wonder it didn't last because I now feel that it must have been a previously used product.  So, all of my future purchases of this product will be made directly through Ulta Beauty only.  I just felt that this point is well worth noting.  I found that one wand did not come close to lasting the full four-month period.  In all honesty, I probably did apply more product than needed during my once-a-day application.  Even so, I feel that there is no way that one wand could possibly last the full four months.  Other than that, I am extremely satisfied with this product and will continue to use it to maintain these results.
faceoff_positive.headline: I am extremely satisfied with this product

faceoff_negative.comments: There are many reviews with quick turnarounds, i.e. people who just started using this product and review it within several days/weeks, etc. I thought it might be helpful to provide feedback as someone who started using this product one year ago. Like many others, I experienced results rather quickly. In fact I was pretty stunned at how fast new brow hair was coming in. In areas where my brows might have been patchy, this product seemed to help initiate new growth, to achieve fullness. As the product states, it does seem to intensify a deeper/darker colored brow. The first six months in using GrandeBROW was great- though expensive, it worked, and fast. Around 6 months however I started to notice some significant differences in this "new" brow hair versus my old brow hair. The new brow hair felt very coarse, much more wirey and abrasive to the touch than my normal soft brows. The new brow hair also grew back in the shape of large letter "C's", making each hair stand in the middle where it arched, and giving an overall unusual appearance when looked at closely. The new brow hair also had a VERY, very short "life span", meaning within 6 months of using the product, hairs would easily fall out when using my Clarisonic face wash or simply scratching an itch, etc. The new brow hair felt, well, fake. It was growing back like small cable wires and had a shelf life of mere months. Of course this could be remedied by continuing to use the product, which I have in much smaller doses. While one full year in using the product has brought in plenty of new growth, it should be stated that in my experience, the hair that grows in is thick, c-shaped wires that fall out rather quickly.
faceoff_negative.headline: 1 Year Review
